articles.description: Duke Nukem Forever's Guinness World Record for being the game longest in development looks to now have been beaten by Ubisoft's Beyond Good and Evil 2 — by 84 days at the time of writing.
articles.content: Beyond Good and Evil 2 has now been in development for 5,240 days since its original trailer was released in 2008, according to GI.biz's Brendan Sinclair on Twitter, which is 84 days longer than the … [+1816 chars]
